title: Forms guidance on list view
results: Overall, there is no detectable difference in form creation and publish rates between treatment and control
notes:
- The feature does not move the primary and secondary metrics (publish rate, median submit rate)

  • There is some evidence that the feature harms the guardrail metric (ticket rate) for a non-trivial segment of customers

    • Note: We are currently limited in drilling into the content of these tickets at scale, but the support areas with the biggest TvC change indicate they may be correlated with need for further guidance or friction with using forms

  • There are other ideas on the roadmap for guidance as well as potentially better designs for exposing recommendation cards (location on forms page, NBA model etc.)
